message: Let's start with a fair split, then we can negotiate from here!
You started with a high offer, I'll try to counter with a more favorable split for me this time.
Let's meet in the middle this time. I'm willing to compromise!
You're getting closer to my target, but I'm still not satisfied with the split. I'll try to push for more.
I'm not afraid to walk away. Meet me in the middle or I'll leave!
